Reviews.Title: Be very, very careful, or find a case for it.
Reviews.Author: Count dTen
Reviews.Content: In many ways a good phone, but very easily scratched. Would be good to know what is a size match for it to make it easier to find a case that fits. Or a way to replace the screen glass....

Reviews.Title: Exceeded all expectations!
Reviews.Author: Zachary Skaggs
Reviews.Content: I was expecting a bottom of the barrel, garbage Android phone at this price point.  After playing with it for a while, however, I realized that it is actually a really solid phone.  It's an older version of Android but it runs VERY smooth on the device and I was able to get several apps installed from the Play Store with no issues running any of them.I highly recommend this as an international phone (my wife is using it to call me from Uganda daily at the moment!) or even a cheap domestic GSM phone.

Reviews.Title: An inexpensive android 3 G global phone
Reviews.Author: supermom at chedworth "ks"
Reviews.Content: My daughter bought this phone for her one year stint in the UK. So far, she is delighted with it. the keys area little temperamental, but all in all a great global phone!

ProductInfo.Features:
3.5'' Touchscreen Android 2.3 Dual-SIM unlocked handset
GSM 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900 MHz & UMTS 850 / 1900 / 2100
Unlocked Dual Standby SIM (can operate two SIM cards at the same time)
2MP Rear Camera, 0.3MP Front Camera, 32GB micro SD slot
Works globally, including Japan, Cambodia, & South Korea
ProductInfo.Name: JT Smart (3G Android) - Dual SIM - Unlocked - Works globally
